title: Apple now selling iPhone 12/Pro via official Refurbished Store
content:
Today, Apple is bringing iPhone 12 series devices to its Certified Refurbished Storefront for the first time. Arriving with as much as $180 in savings attached, various colorways and storage capacities are privy to the first-party savings with notable Apple-backed warranties in tow.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple now selling iPhone 12/Pro via official Refurbished Store appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: iPhone 12 devices have joined the Apple Certified Refurbished Storefront with up to $180 in savings and full official warranties attached.
